g.text: Asks to show the List of Tests to be Sampled.
Before register a Test, the MedicalLabTechnician needs
to select the Clinical Analysis Laboratory where is
[for each test on TestStore verify which of them have sample]
Shows the List of Tests to be sampled.
Choose the Test from Test to be sampled List.
Informs success and ask for how many samples Medical Lab Technician wanna create.
Introduce a number of samples creating the samples with a automatic barcode for that Test.
Asks for confirmation of a Test with samples.
